io.swagger.assert4j.cucumber

Class CucumberRecipeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.swagger.assert4j.cucumber.CucumberRecipeBuilder

  • public class CucumberRecipeBuilder
extends Object
    Class that builds and runs the recipe to be executed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CucumberRecipeBuilder(CucumberRecipeExecutor executor) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTestStep(TestStep testStep)
      Adds a TestStep to the TestCase that is being built; your StepDefs should call this method whenever a new TestStep should get added for execution.
      CucumberRecipeExecutor getExecutor()
      Returns the underlying executor used for executing the constructed TestCase
      TestCase getTestCase()
      The TestCase that is being built by this builder.
      boolean isAssertResult() 
      void run(cucumber.api.Scenario scenario)
      This is the actual handler that runs the created TestCase after it has been assembled by the invoked StepDefs during Cucumber execution.
      void setAssertResult(boolean assertResult)
      Sets if this builder should assert synchronous execution results (default is true)

        @Inject
public CucumberRecipeBuilder(CucumberRecipeExecutor executor)

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(cucumber.api.Scenario scenario)
        This is the actual handler that runs the created TestCase after it has been assembled by the invoked StepDefs during Cucumber execution. If the executor runs the recipe synchronously this call will also asserts that the execution finished without errors
        Parameters:
        scenario -

      • getTestCase

        public TestCase getTestCase()
        The TestCase that is being built by this builder. Use this if you want to customize any of the TestCase properties before execution.
        Returns:
        the current TestCase

      • addTestStep

        public void addTestStep(TestStep testStep)
        Adds a TestStep to the TestCase that is being built; your StepDefs should call this method whenever a new TestStep should get added for execution.
        Parameters:
        testStep - the TestStep to add

      • getExecutor

        public CucumberRecipeExecutor getExecutor()
        Returns the underlying executor used for executing the constructed TestCase
        Returns:
        the underlying executor

      • isAssertResult

        public boolean isAssertResult()
        Returns:
        if this builder will assert synchronous execution results

      • setAssertResult

        public void setAssertResult(boolean assertResult)
        Sets if this builder should assert synchronous execution results (default is true)
        Parameters:
        assertResult - if this builder should assert synchronous execution results
